The biggest gap in beauty is when others are hesitant, you use the best choice to overcome time.

About us:

IERICH is a company specializing in sterling silver jewelry, long-term wearing of sterling silver jewelry is good for the body. IEFRICH has been chasing fashion trends, in order to keep you at the forefront of fashion.

The biggest gap in beauty is when others are hesitant, you use the best choice to overcome time.

Love Heart Initial Necklace

Is this product suitable as a gift?

Fit, this heart letter necklace comes in a delicate packaging, perfect as a gift to give to someone.

Are our products of high quality?

Our Heart Letter Necklaces are manufactured from high quality sterling silver and zircon that have undergone layers of processing to the highest quality.

Why buy our products?

Why not give yourself a chance to be more beautiful that？

Gifts for the Love

Gifts for DaughterGifts for GirlfriendGifts for Wife

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 2, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ IEFRICH
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TR3VNV9

Material of Sterling Silver Heart Necklace: the initial necklace is made of S925 sterling silver and CZ. It is nickel and lead free, hypoallergenic and harmless to skin. Our products are strictly controlled and have the highest quality. The color of silver is full and it is better for your body to wear silver jewelry for a long time.
Package: This sterling silver initial necklace is delivered by Amazon fast, with a beautiful gift box, a soft cloth, a thank you card, it is really suitable as a gift for your loved ones.
Perfect Gift: The initial heart necklace comes in a beautiful package and is the perfect gift for your daughter, girlfriend, granddaughter, sister, mom or someone special in your life. It can also be a great decoration for anniversaries, wedding anniversaries, and represent your thoughts of your loved one with a necklace containing their name.
Welcome To Iefrich Jewelry: You can post your questions in the “Customer Q&A” section at the bottom of the page and you will get an answer from us or the buyer as soon as possible. If you are not completely satisfied with our products, please feel free to contact us and we will try our best to solve your problem. We offer 90 days after-sales service.专利产品，禁止模仿
